CustomField.description: This formula field is to list all AE 1 Name
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Account_Executive_1__c != '', Account_Executive_2__c = ''),Account_Executive_1__r.FirstName & ' ' & Account_Executive_1__r.LastName,IF(AND(Account_Executive_1__c != '', Account_Executive_2__c != ''),Account_Executive_1__r.FirstName & ' ' & Account_Executive_1__r.LastName, Account_Executive_2__r.FirstName & ' ' & Account_Executive_2__r.LastName))
CustomField.label: AE Base Name
